game.name: Christmas Party Girls
game.description:
We are very close to the Christmas and New Year Celebration! However, before celebrating the New Year, we would not like to miss out any opportunity that allows us to enjoy the spirit of Christmas. Today here we have got you covered with a brand new dressing game where you will meet three beautiful girls who have got the invitation to a grand Christmas Party. They need your help urgently. Join Christmas Party Girls and be prepared to show off your fashion moves by creating awesome outfits for them!

You can help these gorgeous girls one by one. Choose your girl and then a tree and get ready then to enter the fun-filled environment! Make sure to decorate a tree for your chosen girl before finalizing a dress for her. Choose any tree out of the three options and then get ready to dress up your chosen girl with the desired outfits! Give her a nice hairstyle, a long beautiful gown, and a pair of cool sandals in this HTML5 girls game!

Do not forget to give picture a fabulous matching background. In the final step, you can also complete her picture with the selection of a handsome matching boy. Dress up all the fabulous girls one by one to have a great fun without download! Make sure to click the camera to save their final looks for the future. We are pretty sure that all three girls will appreciate your work from the bottom of their heart. Invite your friends to play this cool dress up challenge!
